function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prevalence of antimicrobial resistance genes (ARGs) in influent wastewater","Impact":"Potential for transmission of antimicrobial resistance to the wider community","Mitigation":"Implement advanced wastewater treatment technologies to remove ARGs","Technologies":"Advanced oxidation processes, membrane filtration, UV radiation","People":"Wastewater treatment plant operators, public health authorities","Owner":"Wastewater treatment plant operators"},{"Description":"Lack of population-scale epidemiological information for AMR surveillance","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of disease and resistance circulation within the community","Mitigation":"Implement wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) to gather population-wide information on disease and resistance","Technologies":"qPCR techniques for studying ARGs, data analysis and modeling for epidemiological understanding","People":"Public health authorities, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Correlations between antibiotic levels and abundance of ARGs in wastewater","Impact":"Potential for increased antimicrobial resistance due to antibiotic-ARG correlations","Mitigation":"Regulate antibiotic use and prescribing practices, monitor antibiotic effluent levels, implement advanced treatment processes","Technologies":"Antibiotic monitoring technologies, advanced treatment processes","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare professionals, wastewater treatment plant operators","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
